locations.name: Lake Como area (e.g., Bellagio)
locations.description: The tour begins here, focusing on lakeside villages like Bellagio and Varenna. A stay in this elegant Italian lake region is implied.

locations.name: Swiss Alps region (e.g., Grindelwald or Interlaken area)
locations.description: The tour transitions to the Swiss Alps, mentioning iconic mountain railways and panoramic vistas, suggesting a stay in a central alpine location like Grindelwald (coordinates provided) or the nearby Interlaken hub, offering access to mountains and valleys.

locations.name: Lucerne
locations.description: The tour concludes on the shores of Lake Lucerne, specifically mentioning exploring Lucerne's Old Town and Chapel Bridge, indicating an overnight stay in the city of Lucerne.
